mapper.select: SELECT MAX(RIGHT(orderNo, 4)) FROM be_order WHERE LEFT(orderNo, 2)=#{orderType} AND LEFT(RIGHT(OrderNo, 9), 2)=MONTH(CURDATE());

SELECT bo.`OrderNo`,bo.`OrderType`,bf.`StepName`,sd.`DeptName`,bo.`LastEditDate`,us.`UserName` FROM be_order AS bo,be_flow AS bf,sy_dept AS sd,us_user AS us WHERE bo.`StepID` = bf.`ID` AND bf.`DeptID` = sd.`ID` AND bo.`UserNo` = us.`UserNo`

SELECT bo.`OrderNo`, bo.`OrderType`, bf.`StepName`, sd.`DeptName`, bo.`LastEditDate`, us.`UserName` FROM be_order AS bo, be_flow AS bf, sy_dept AS sd, us_user AS us WHERE bo.`StepID` = bf.`ID` AND bf.`DeptID` = sd.`ID` AND bo.`UserNo` = us.`UserNo` AND bo.`OrderType` IN (#{orderType}) AND bo.`StepID` = #{stepId};
